title: NEW LOOK & LEASE Specials on our 2bd2ba APT.
posting_body: ['Quaint building in the heart of Glendale!', 'Newly renovated, top floor, corner unit with east facing balcony for the beautiful morning sunshine.', 'Nice, bright, sunny unit with large floor plan.', 'Interior renovations include luxury plank flooring in the living areas, new plush carpeting in the bedrooms, all new stainless-steel appliances including refrigerator, gas range, microwave, garbage disposal and dishwasher; beautiful stone granite countertops in the kitchen and bathrooms, new cabinets and fixtures throughout; as well as central air conditioning and heat with digital programmable Nest thermostat.', 'Great walkable neighborhood; centrally located to amazing shopping, dining; and easy access to 134, 5, and 2 freeways!', 'AVAILABLE NOW!', "\xa0THIS ONE WON'T LAST - CALL TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING!!", '-Assigned Off Street Parking', '-On-site Laundry', '-Recycling', '-Ceiling Fan', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Garbage Disposal', '-Balcony', '-Close to Public Transportation', '-Easy Access to World Class Shopping & Dining', '-Luxury Plank Flooring', '-Plush', 'Carpeting', '-Modern Fixtures', '-Controlled Access/Gated', '-Central A/C', '-Online Resident Portal', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
